properties.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 3:05AM PST until February 4 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to
50 mph expected.

* WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In
Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM PST /8 PM MST/ Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult for high profile vehicles. Strong winds
over the open waters will make the lake water rough and
hazardous...and may result in high waves which may tip or
swamp smaller craft.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST /8 PM MST/ TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED
